hero.title: The All in One Crypto
hero.description: Algorithmic trading, boosted by ML—integrated with your exchange.

steps.backtest: Backtest and pick the best one

data.label: Data
data.title: Fetch data
data.description: We are fetching financial data from the crypto exchanges. All indicators and algorithms are calculated inside the app.

algorithm.label: Algorithm
algorithm.title: Custom algorithms
algorithm.description: We transformed +10 years of trading experience into algorithms.

backtest.label: Backtest
backtest.title: Backtest algorithm
backtest.description: Backtest Algorithms to see performance of every algorithm. And pick the best one.

decision.label: Decision
decision.title: Do we trade?
decision.description: Our machine learning model helps improve algorithm performance. And make decisions to trade or not.

cryptoExchange.label: Crypto Exchange
cryptoExchange.title: Crypto Exchange
cryptoExchange.description: Trading bot opens and closes positions on crypto exchange automatically.

trainClassifier.label: Train classifier
trainClassifier.title: Train classifier
trainClassifier.description: We train our machine learning model to make better decisions.

mlModel.label: ML Model
mlModel.title: Trained model
mlModel.description: The trained model is used to spot weak signals generated by the algorithms.

tradingJournal.label: Trading Journal
tradingJournal.title: Trading Journal
tradingJournal.description: We keep track of all our trades in a trading journal.

backtestModel.label: Backtest
backtestModel.title: Backtest trained model
backtestModel.description: Backtest the trained model to see how it performs with different parameters.

indicators.label: Indicators
indicators.title: Indicators
indicators.description: We use indicators to train models and identify weak spots in algorithms.

financialData.label: Financial Data
financialData.title: Financial Data
financialData.description: We use financial data to train models and identify weak spots in algorithms.

sphere.title: Bring ML to your trading
sphere.description: Our Machine Learning models are trained on thousands of trades to boost algorithm performance.

step1.title: Log in or create an account to get started
step1.description: Create a secure account to unlock every tool. We protect your information with industry-standard encryption and strict access controls, so your data stays private while you work.
step1.containerTitle: Log in or create an account

step2.title: Pick algorithm and cryptocurrency to trade
step2.description: Pick an algorithm, then a cryptocurrency, and backtest the pair. You're free to explore as many combinations as you like to find the most profitable one.

step3.title: Connect to your crypto exchange
step3.description: We support the most popular crypto exchanges and are working on adding even more. You can also generate signals and trade on your own.

step4.title: Trading bot will trade for you automatically
step4.description: Our trading bot will trade for you automatically. You can set the parameters and let it trade for you. 24/7 without breaks and mistakes.
step4.containerTitle: You all set! Now bot will trade for you

footer.title: Get 6 months
footer.description: Get access to our trading algorithms, backtest and machine learning models for 6 months for free. No credit card required.
footer.tagline: Trading platform for automated crypto trading

review1.quote: With Algo Squid I've got so much more free time.
review1.description: With Algo Squid I'm not longer need to spend hours on monitoring markets manualy to open positions in the right time. I can focus on other things while bot is working for me.
review1.name: Pawel Kowalski

review2.quote: I'm so glad I found Algo Squid. The precision of the algorithms and bot is amazing.
review2.name: Omar El-Sayed

review3.quote: It has completely transformed my trading.
review3.description: From generating trading signals to tracking algorithms performance over time and automatically open positions.
review3.name: Alexey Kuznetsov

review4.quote: Machine Learning moved algorithm performance to level I never thought possible.
review4.description: Having machine learning to reduce number of false signals is a game changer.
review4.name: Steve Smith

plan.trialEndsMessage: Your trial will end on {date} at {time}. You can upgrade to pro plan to continue using the bot.

instances.instanceDescription: Instance is a function that will run on the cloud 24/7 constantly checking for new signals. Once signal is detected, the instance will open a position on the exchange. After instance automatically closes the position once opposite signal is detected.
instances.visitDocumentation: Visit documentation page for more information

limitBanner.line1: You can only have up to 3 instances.
limitBanner.line2: We are working on increasing this limit.

instances.configureDescription: Configure the strategy and exchange for this instance. It will run in the cloud.

errors.notFound: Instance not found or not accessible
